name: Two Minute Chase
description:
Evening, 

This very brief and simple game was put together for the Winter 2018 My First Game Jam in Unreal Engine 4. Due to other constraints, I had to park this and finish it up early but it is functional!

Basis of the game is to survive for two minutes, by running and slowing time to dodge the cubes.

Controls:

- LMB to Move

- F to Slow Time

Thanks for checking it out!

Edit: - Shortly I will upload the UEAsset files for anybody to use and reference. I will update this when ready.
